_id.description: The unique document ID which should start with `note:` and the remains are randomly generated string

_rev.description: This is a CouchDB specific field. The current MVCC-token/revision of this document (mandatory and immutable).

doctype.description: The format type of the body field. It currently can take markdown only, reserved for the future

body.description: The content of the note represented with Markdown

updatedAt.description: The date time when the note was last updated, represented with Unix timestamps in milliseconds

createdAt.description: The date time when the note was created, represented with Unix timestamps in milliseconds

migratedBy.description: The type of the data migration

share.description: The sharing mode of the note
